spanGrp.span: Boy’s parents come to arrange a date of the wedding.
oğlanın anasi babasi gäler söz alerlär navah ğızınan oğlana dügün olajah
Girl’s father says that they can come on Saturday or on Sunday.
ğızın babasi söz verer ili bazar güni ili sava güni gälırsız
Then they come with a drum and take her to boy’s house.
sorada gälerlär ğızi oğlannan davulunan išınän aler götürerlär oğlanın ävınä
The girl and boy take their seats.
Girl’s relatives and boy’s relatives eat and drink.
halhta äp oturer oğlan täräfi ğız täräfi ierlär ičerlär
And boy and girl go to their house.
